articles.title: Malaika Arora is back to Mumbai after a splendid Goa vacation with Arjun Kapoor. See pic - India Today
articles.description: Malaika Arora has returned to Mumbai after celebrating Christmas and the New Year with her boyfriend Arjun Kapoor and family. Malaika shared a picture of the clean open Mumbai roads, which appears to have been taken while she was out on a walk.
